TEXT.TITLE: REICHOLD CHEMICALS <RCI> INCREASES PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Reichhold Chemicals Inc said it is raising the prices of its Emulsion Polymers Division's styrene-based latexes for nowovens, textiles, adhesives and other specialty end uses, effective April nine. The increases range between three and nine cts per dry pound. Reuter
